title: [Large-scale] Real-Time Remote Foreign Language Instruction Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Participatory education design course conducted via smartphone-based real-time video lectures, requiring flexible scheduling for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain five key elements to consider in foreign language curriculum design: language skills, gender, academic level, learning community, and age.
Learners can design three types of student engagement activities (discussions, role-plays, feedback sessions) implementable in smartphone environments.
Learners can establish personalized feedback strategies for individual learners when designing formative assessment-based processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
